body: @madari could also update the other obselete repo link references? After doing a grep in directory /doc articles.html I get back about 17 lines altogether ```shell $ grep -Rn 'code.google.com/p/codesearch' * articles/go_command.html:167:$ go get code.google.com/p/codesearch/index articles/go_command.html:174:src/code.google.com/p/codesearch/index/ and articles/go_command.html:188:code.google.com/p/codesearch/cmd/cgrep articles/go_command.html:189:code.google.com/p/codesearch/cmd/cindex articles/go_command.html:190:code.google.com/p/codesearch/cmd/csearch articles/go_command.html:191:code.google.com/p/codesearch/index articles/go_command.html:192:code.google.com/p/codesearch/regexp articles/go_command.html:193:code.google.com/p/codesearch/sparse articles/go_command.html:203:? code.google.com/p/codesearch/cmd/cgrep [no test files] articles/go_command.html:204:? code.google.com/p/codesearch/cmd/cindex [no test files] articles/go_command.html:205:? code.google.com/p/codesearch/cmd/csearch [no test files] articles/go_command.html:206:ok code.google.com/p/codesearch/index 0.239s articles/go_command.html:207:ok code.google.com/p/codesearch/regexp 0.021s articles/go_command.html:208:? code.google.com/p/codesearch/sparse [no test files] articles/go_command.html:218:$ cd $GOPATH/src/code.google.com/p/codesearch/regexp articles/go_command.html:220:code.google.com/p/codesearch/regexp articles/go_command.html:229:ok code.google.com/p/codesearch/regexp 0.021s ``` and all those hits are now under https://github.com/google/codesearch.
